data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Yongzhou.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Yongzhou, Hunan, China
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Yongzhou you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 4,721,517 who are far from you in Yongzhou, Hunan, China from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Yongzhou, Hunan, China from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.prayer: Father, 0.2% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 394,478 believers in Yongzhou, Hunan, China a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Yongzhou, Hunan, China with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.prayer: Lord, make the 394,478 believers in Yongzhou to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 4,805,522 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

location.name: Yongzhou
location.people_groups_list: Ao Biao, Ban Yao, Biao-Jiao Mien, Biao Mien, Shikou, Chadong
